name: Death's Life
description: Now youâ€™re the new apprentice for Death. And it's your job to help gather souls. Only thing is, you can't just go and kill people to get the souls, it has to look natural. Like an accident. And that means setting up bottles, knives, brooms, and other regular objects in such a way as to create deadly chain reactions.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
